testRoots.description: List of roots to scan for test executables.

label.description: Display label for this root in the Testing UI.

groupByLabel.description: If true, roots with the same label appear under a shared group.

workspacePath.description: Workspace-relative path to the root directory containing test executables.

path.description: Absolute OR workspace-relative path (supports ./ and ../) to the root directory containing test executables.

pattern.description: Filename pattern for test executables (e.g., test_* , *_test).
